Class Name

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.bcit.comp1510.lab6.Name

  • public class Name
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents first, middle, and last name.

    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Chih-Hsi Chang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Name(java.lang.String first, java.lang.String middle, java.lang.String last)
      Constructs an name object by defining its first, middle, and last name.
